sentences.sContent: If that doesn't work, do a Web search on the term "recruiter" or "HR director" along with the name of your employer of choice.
sentences.sContent_eng: If that doesn't work, do a Web search on the term "recruiter" or "HR director" along with the name of your employer of choice.
sentences.sCn: 如果这招无效的话，那就在网站上输入你可选择的雇主名单加上“招聘人员”或“人力资源部经理”一起搜索。

sentences.sContent: If you feel the recruiter can't meet the challenge, you may need to raise the issue with the head of recruiting or human resources.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you feel the recruiter can't meet the challenge, you may need to raise the issue with the head of recruiting or human resources.
sentences.sCn: 如果你觉得招聘人员无法完成这一挑战，你可能就得把问题提交给招聘或人力资源部门的负责人了。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, if recruiting is a major function, it may be in the company's best interest to have a professional recruiter and another employee to handle all the other functions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, if recruiting is a major function, it may be in the company's best interest to have a professional recruiter and another employee to handle all the other functions.
sentences.sCn: 因此，如果招聘是一个重要的职能，符合该公司的最大利益的做法是，有专业的招聘人员和另一名雇员来处理所有其他职能。
